thread.title: Chiropractor designs a ‘lipstick GLUE’ to seal the vagina shut – and claims it’s an alternative to a tampon
thread.title_full: Chiropractor designs a ‘lipstick GLUE’ to seal the vagina shut – and claims it’s an alternative to a tampon

author: adowney
title: Chiropractor designs a ‘lipstick GLUE’ to seal the vagina shut – and claims it’s an alternative to a tampon
text:
Mrs Crunch IS HE SERIOUS? Chiropractor designs a ‘lipstick GLUE’ to seal the vagina shut – and claims it’s an alternative to a tampon 
The US chiropractor is suggesting women glue their vaginas together to hold in menstrual blood while they have their periods so they can expel fluids without pads or tampons needed By RACHEL CORBETT FOR NEWS.COM.AU 21st February 2017, 3:45 pm
